  • Description

    This Icebox Kitchen Knife Ring is made of 14K Yellow gold with 0.25ctw of diamonds. This piece is handcrafted and manufactured by Icebox. All of the diamonds are hand-set by a master diamond setter in the highest quality craftsmanship. This piece is made of solid Yellow gold.
